question.body: Which of the following is correct description of a chemical synapse, our most common type of synapse in the body?

multiple_choice.choice: it allows ions and chemicals to pass directly from one cell to another
it involves gap junctions and very quick propagation of signal
it allows coordinated contraction of cardiac and smooth muscles
it allows integration of multiple excitatory and inhibitory signals
it involves bidirectional flow between cells

response.feedback: Incorrect. This would be a description of an electrical synapse’s function.
Incorrect. This would be a description of an electrical synapse’s function.
Incorrect. This would be a description of an electrical synapse’s function.
Correct. It uses chemical messages from several presynaptic neurons to determine reaction of postsynaptic neuron.
Incorrect. This would be a description of an electrical synapse’s function.

part.hint: Both chemical and electrical synapses are found in body with different functions.
